title: Music Player for the Tvoy Hit Song Store
description: Reworking the logic of the standard Tilda product catalog into a catalog of music compositions and integrating with a custom audio player.

info.client: Tvoy Hit - a song store by singer, composer, arranger, and music producer Oleg Shaumarov.

1.title: Constructor limitations
1.text: The website is built using the Tilda constructor. The standard implementation approach won't work, so the underlying Tilda framework needed to be studied.

2.title: Responsiveness
2.text: In addition to player functionality, it also needed to be adapted for different platforms/devices.

dev.1: Implemented using constant variables for reuse in other projects.
dev.2: Each function is isolated, reducing the likelihood of unexpected issues or errors affecting other functions.
dev.3: Track data is retrieved directly from the Tilda product catalog, allowing even a regular user to edit the playlist.
dev.4: Adaptive player behavior for any device is also implemented via code.
dev.5: Basic styles for proper player functionality are also stored within the code.
